bill.title: Notification of Chapter 91 Hearing; Department of Labor and Industrial Relations
bill.description: Authorizes the Department of Labor and Industrial Relations to provide notice of hearings pursuant to chapter 91, Hawaii Revised Statutes, by written notice of hearing by first class mail, rather than registered or certified mail with return receipt. Authorizes the department to provide notice of hearing by publication if a party's address cannot be ascertained. (SD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.

(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-07-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Carroll, Coffman.

Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Kawakami, Morikawa, Tokioka, Ward.

(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 638) in amended form (SD 1).
